news_header: The text discusses recent trends in global markets, particularly focusing on the performance of ETFs and stock trading in 2024.
news_text: The text highlights the recovery of global markets in 2024, driven by falling interest rates, consumer spending, and strong earnings, particularly in AI-related companies. The U.S. ETF industry saw record inflows, surpassing $1 trillion for the first time, with most new ETFs being actively managed. Trading volumes have increased, especially in low-priced stocks, while options trading has also grown significantly. The overall growth in stock and options markets contributes to the financial security of U.S. households and supports economic growth.
